metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - May 26, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas Edit 1) builds out the Allocation System Primitive, 2) adds Spark-Launch Agent 1 Ecosystem Accord, 3) adds Sky-Spark-Launch Agent 1 Ecosystem Accord, 4) adds logic regarding key interest rates, 5) updates Risk Framework, 6) renames First Loss Capital To Junior Risk Capital, 7) updates logic regarding distribution of Agent Tokens, 8) updates Spark Liquidity Layer documentation, 9) updates Spark Artifact based on Ecosystem Accords, 10) updates Launch Agent 1 Artifact based on Ecosystem Accords.

metadata.title: SparkLend Mainnet - Onboard August PT-USDS to Morpho Spark DAI Vault - May 26, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding PT-USDS-14Aug2025 to the Morpho DAI vault.

metadata.title: SparkLend Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Increase USDe Mint and Staking Rate Limits - May 26, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to increasing the USDe Mint and Staking Rate Limits on the Spark Liquidity Layer.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Add Spark Liquidity Layer to Spark DAI Morpho Vault Allocator Role - June 2, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to adding the Spark Liquidity Layer to the Allocator Role of the Spark DAI Morpho Vault.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - June 2, 2025
metadata.summary: This proposal sets forth the core deflationary tokenomics of the SKY token.

metadata.title: Spark DAI Morpho Vault Mainnet - Update Vault Fee - June 2, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to increasing the Vault Fee of the Spark DAI Morpho Vault on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark USDC Morpho Vault Base - Update Vault Fee - June 2, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to increasing the Vault Fee of the Spark USDC Morpho Vault on Base.

metadata.title: Spark DAI Morpho Vault Mainnet - Onboard New Ethena PTs to the Morpho Spark DAI Vault - June 2, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding new Ethena PTs to the Morpho Spark DAI Vault.

metadata.title: Spark DAI Morpho Vault Mainnet – Reduce Supply Cap for Inactive Pools - June 2, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to reducing the supply caps of the inactive pools in the Spark DAI Morpho Vault on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Update syrupUSDC Rate Limits - June 2, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to updating the syrupUSDC Rate Limits for the Spark Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet – Onboard Spark DAI Morpho Vault - June 2, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding the Spark DAI Morpho Vault to the Spark Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: SparkLend Mainnet - Update ezETH Parameters - June 2, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to updating the ezETH parameters for SparkLend on mainnet.

metadata.title: SparkLend Mainnet - Update Stablecoin Market Reserve Factors - June 2, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to updating the stablecoin market reserve factors for SparkLend on mainnet.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Monthly Cycle Proposal (AEP-11) - June 9, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas Edit formalizes and refines the moderation policies of the Sky ecosystem communication channels for increased transparency and coordination.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - June 9, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas Edit 1) adds a timeline for disabling the legacy conversion contract, 2) refines SKY Rewards rate normalization process, 3) updates the Spark Artifact and the Ecosystem Accord to prepare for the SPK Launch.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - June 16, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas Edit updates various artifacts, risk frameworks, and governance processes to enhance clarity, functionality, and alignment with the Sky Protocol's governance standards.

metadata.title: Increase ALLOCATOR-BLOOM-A Maximum Debt Ceiling - June 16, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to increasing the ALLOCATOR-BLOOM-A Maximum Debt Ceiling.

metadata.title: Spark DAI Morpho Vault Mainnet - Onboard LP-USDS-14Aug-2025 to the Spark DAI Morpho Vault - June 16, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding LP-USDS-14Aug to the Spark DAI Morpho Vault.

metadata.title: Spark DAI Morpho Vault Mainnet - Onboard syrupUSDC August PT to the Spark DAI Morpho Vault - June 16, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding the syrupUSDC August PT to the Spark DAI Morpho Vault.

metadata.title: Spark DAI Morpho Vault Mainnet - Onboard USDe September PT to the Spark DAI Morpho Vault - June 16, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding the USDe September PT to the Spark DAI Morpho Vault.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - June 23, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas Edit 1) adds timeline for transferring control of Spark infrastructure from Sky Governance to Spark, 2) updates risk framework and asset liability management framework for latest improvements recommended by BA Labs, 3) adds specifications for Spark Genesis Capital Allocation, 4) limits Spark and Launch Agent 1 from receiving Accessibility Reward bonus on USDS and sUSDS balances they hold, 5) authorizes Launch Agent 2 to deploy idle cash into lending markets on Solana subject to approval of its Operational Executor Agent, 6) makes minor corrections to the Atlas following up on the SPK Launch, 7) adds Aave USDC on Base as an active Instance and corrects references and parameters.

metadata.title: Smart Burn Engine Parameter Update - June 23, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to updating the SBE vow.hump parameter.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - June 30, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas Edit 1) documents transfer of funds to Launch Agent 2 and establishes a Pre-Pioneer Incentive Pool, 2) authorizes a gradual increase in Stability Fees for Core Vaults to incentivize migration to platforms maintained by Stars, 3) updates near-term Financial Required Risk Capital Percentage for Real World Assets to cover JAAA, 4) adds additional Instances to the Grove Allocation System Primitive, 5) updates the references from Launch Agent 1 to Grove now that Grove has publicly launched, 6) specifies that funds borrowed by Agents must be invested into Allocation System Instances, 7) updates references to the Accessibility Reward Fee to reflect the total fee that can be earned, 8) updates the title of an internal reference to ensure accuracy in the Atlas.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - July 7, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas Edit 1) updates the value of the Sky Spread to 10 basis points, 2) clarifies that Star Agents can operationalize their Allocation System Instances under certain conditions, 3) removes documents related to offboarded Peg Stability Modules.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - July 14, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas Edit 1) adds Launch Agent 2 reference to Ecosystem Accord, 2) updates documentation for Arranged Structures, 3) adds definition of unrewarded USDS, 4) clarifies emergency process documentation, 5) updates capitalization of "Risk Framework", 6) updates name of Actively Stabilizing Collateral Rental Primitive.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Base - Increase Spark USDC Morpho Vault Rate Limits - July 14, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to increasing the Spark USDC Morpho Vault Rate Limits on Base.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Deploy Spark USDS Morpho Vault and Onboard PT-SPK-USDS Farm - July 14, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to deploying a new Spark USDS Morpho Vault and onboarding PT-USDS-24Sep2025.

metadata.title: SparkLend Mainnet - Reduce WBTC Liquidation Threshold - July 14, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to reducing the WBTC Liquidation Threshold on SparkLend Mainnet.

metadata.title: SparkLend Mainnet - Transfer Accumulated SparkLend ETH to Multisig to be Liquidated - July 14, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to transferring the accumulated SparkLend ETH to a multisig to be liquidated.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Grove Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Facilitate Spark Transfer of BUIDL and JTRSY Tokens to Grove - July 14, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to transferring BUIDL and JTRSY tokens to Grove.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - July 21, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas Edit 1) replaces the date of finalization of the Risk Framework with a specific date of July 1, 2025 for certain milestones related to Spark and Grove TGE and income generation, 2) updates the naming convention of the contracts in the Governance Security Article to be consistent with the Chainlog keys and standardizes references to the GSM Pause Delay, 3) adds a definition of the Chainlog to the Atlas, 4) clarifies that Star Agents should use their specified category when posting on the Sky Forum, 5) adds interim logic for the way in which Launch Agent 2 and Launch Agent 3 can update their respective Artifacts, 6) clarifies that any leftover funds in a derecognized AD's Buffer, after deduction of penalties, should be paid out to the AD.

metadata.title: Grove Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Approve DAO Resolution Authorizing the Subscription to the Janus Henderson Anemoy AAA CLO Fund by Aspen Grove Ltd - July 21, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to approving a DAO Resolution authorizing the subscription to the Janus Henderson Anemoy AAA CLO Fund by Aspen Grove Ltd.

metadata.title: Grove Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Onboard BlackRock BUIDL-I - July 21, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding BlackRock BUIDL-I on the Grove Liquidity Layer on Mainnet.

metadata.title: Grove Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Onboard Centrifuge JTRSY - July 21, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding Centrifuge JTRSY on the Grove Liquidity Layer on Mainnet.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - July 28, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas Edit 1) introduces a framework for a staged implementation of the Monthly Settlement Cycle, 2) updates the methodology for estimating slippage in the Risk Framework, 3) provides Launch Agent 2 with flexibility to fund development with capital previously allocated to providing liquidity, 4) clarifies the process for how Research Proposals are approved and outlines the associated governance procedures, 5) corrects a minor typographical error regarding the Launch Agent 3 Artifact update process introduced in a previous proposal.

metadata.title: Grove Star - Approve DAO Resolution Authorizing Grove Foundation to Enter into Strategic Partnerships - July 28, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to the DAO Resolution authorizing the Grove Foundation to enter into strategic partnerships.

metadata.title: Grove Liquidity Layer Mainnet and Avalanche - Deploy Grove Liquidity Layer on Avalanche - July 28, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to deploying the Grove Liquidity Layer on Avalanche.

metadata.title: Grove Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Onboard Centrifuge V3 and Offboard Centrifuge V2 - July 28, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding Centrifuge V3 to the Grove Liquidity Layer and offboarding Centrifuge V2.

metadata.title: Grove Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Onboard Ethena sUSDe and USDe - July 28, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding sUSDe and USDe to the Grove Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Onboard Curve pyUSD-USDC Pool for Swaps - July 28, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding the Curve pyUSD-USDC pool to the Spark Liquidity Layer with the listed parameters.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Onboard SparkLend pyUSD - July 28, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding SparkLend pyUSD to the Spark Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark DAI Morpho Vault Mainnet - Deactivate Legacy Morpho DAI Vault DDM - July 28, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to deactivating the legacy DDM to the Spark Morpho DAI Vault.

metadata.title: SparkLend Mainnet - Enable Flash Loans for USDS - July 28, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to enabling flash loans for USDS from SparkLend on mainnet.

metadata.title: SparkLend Mainnet - Onboard pyUSD - July 28, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding pyUSD to SparkLend on mainnet with the listed parameters.

metadata.title: SparkLend Mainnet - Update Stablecoin Rate Models to Account for Base Rate Spread - July 28, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to updating the stablecoin rate models for Sparklend on mainnet with the parameters listed below.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - August 4, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas edit 1) documents the simplified profit and loss calculation that will be used in Stage 1 of the implementation of the Monthly Settlement Cycle, 2) updates the minimum level of Actively Stabilizing Collateral that Stars must maintain and defines Resting versus Latent Actively Stabilizing Collateral, 3) updates the Required Risk Capital for Real World Assets to take into account new versus existing deployments, 4) removes exceptions for Maple from the Risk Framework since risk assessments for Maple have now been completed, 5) adds the terms for sharing revenue from investments in USDe and sUSDe to the Ecosystem Accord between Spark and Grove, 6) updates the name of yUSDS to stUSDS, 7) incorporates the Linear Interpolation Module and its features in the Atlas.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal 2 - August 11, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas Edit 1) adds Ecosystem Entity grants, 2) modifies token rewards and the burn engine.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - August 11, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas Edit 1) renames Star Agents to Prime Agents, 2) renames Prime Delegates to Ranked Delegates, 3) updates Ethena risk capital requirements, 4) refines risk requirements for Real World Assets, 5) clarifies operator of the Spark Liquidity Layer, 6) removes logic for DDM Vaults from Sky Core Atlas, 7) unifies terminology for administrative risk, 8) makes follow up changes from the August 4th Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal.

metadata.title: Grove Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Upgrade Controller - Add Centrifuge Crosschain Transfers - August 11, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to upgrading the Grove Liquidity Layer controller on mainnet to enable Centrifuge crosschain transfers.

metadata.title: Grove Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Upgrade Controller - Add Centrifuge Functionality - August 11, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to upgrade the Grove Liquidity Layer's ForeignController on mainnet with added functionality related to ERC7540 Centrifuge vaults.

metadata.title: Grove Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Onboard Centrifuge V3 and Offboard Centrifuge V2 - August 11, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to transitioning from the existing Tokenized JAAA and Tokenized JTRSY vaults on Centrifuge V2 to the Tokenized JAAA and Tokenized JTRSY vaults on Centrifuge V3 for the Grove Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Spark USDS Morpho Vault - Activate Vault Fee - August 11, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to adding a 10% vault curator fee to the newly launched Spark USDS Morpho vault on Ethereum mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark Treasury - Authorize Rate Limited Transfer of MORPHO Tokens to Multisig - August 11, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to authorizing a rate-limited transfer of MORPHO tokens from the Spark Treasury to a Spark multisig on mainnet.

metadata.title: SparkLend Mainnet - Refresh Market Parameters for Multiple Assets - August 11, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to updating SparkLend market parameters for the multiple assets.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - August 18, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas edit 1) introduces a Delegate System for Spark, 2) updates the organization of the Risk Framework to move all short-term logic to the Implementation section, 3) updates the name of yAudit to Electisec to reflect their rebranding, 4) removes documents for the deprecated Morpho Direct Deposit Module and Spark Dai Direct Deposit Modules.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Update SparkLend USDS Rate Limits - August 18, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to updating SparkLend USDS Rate Limits on the Spark Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark USDS Morpho Vault Mainnet - Adjust PT-USDS-SPK-25Sept Pool Supply Cap - August 18, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to adjusting the PT-USDS-SPK-25Sept pool supply cap in the Spark USDS Morpho Vault on mainnet.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - August 25, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas edit 1) changes the funding source for the Accessibility Reward Wallet, 2) protects anonymity of Spark delegates, 3) adds pyUSD to the Risk Framework, 4) clarifies approval requirements for Agent Root Edits, 5) moves authority for approving additional lending markets to the Core Executor Agents, 6) updates SparkLend multisig and clarifies update process, 7) corrects the responsible party for updating active data, 8) completes the renaming of Stars to Primes.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - September 1, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas edit 1) defines the parameters of stUSDS and the process of updating them in preparation for the launch of stUSDS, 2) defines a resolution process for the Core Simplification Buffer Budget, 3) revises the calculation of Smart Contract Risk to reflect the latest process and updates the list of auditors, 4) updates the Instance Financial RRC Ratio for Ethena to account for lending Ethena related assets against other Ethena related assets, 5) makes the Governance Facilitators responsible for updating the members of the Emergency Response Group, 6) adds definitions of commonly used parameters in Prime Agent Liquidity Layers, 7) clarifies the rules for how Prime Agents and Integrators can split the Accessibility Reward, 8) makes minor spelling and grammatical corrections.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Increase Curve Swap Rate Limits - September 1, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to increasing Curve swap rate limits in the Spark Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Increase SparkLend spUSDT and spPYUSD Deposit Rate Limits - September 1, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to increasing SparkLend spUSDT and spPYUSD deposit rate limits in the Spark Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Onboard Aave aUSDe - September 1, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding Aave aUSDe to the Spark Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Onboard Spark USDC Morpho Vault - September 1, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding the Spark USDC Morpho vault to the Spark Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Transfer BUIDL to Grove - September 1, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to transferring residual BUIDL tokens to Grove from the Spark ALM Proxy.

metadata.title: Spark USDC Morpho Vault Mainnet - Create Vault and Onboard Pools - September 1, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to creating a Spark USDC Morpho vault on mainnet and onboarding the listed pools.

metadata.title: Spark USDS Morpho Vault Mainnet - Onboard November Ethena PTs - September 1, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding November Ethena PTs to the Spark USDS Morpho vault on mainnet.

metadata.title: SparkLend Mainnet - Withdraw USDS and DAI Reserves from SparkLend - September 1, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to withdrawing USDS and DAI reserves from SparkLend to the Spark Proxy on mainnet.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - September 8, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas edit 1) defines the Monthly Settlement Cycle process, 2) renames DAOcraft to Amatsu, 3) removes the Sky Core Simplification Budget, 4) refines the stUSDS BEAM GSM Pause Delay exception, 5) adds stUSDS Rate Normalization logic, 6) adds definition of Sky Forum, 7) removes remaining reference to Star.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Base - Activate MORPHO Transfer Rate Limit - September 8, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to activating a MORPHO transfer rate limit for the Spark Liquidity Layer on Base.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Base - Increase USDC CCTP Rate Limits - September 8, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to increasing the USDC Cross-chain Transfer Protocol rate limits on Base.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Base - Upgrade ALM Controller to v1.7 - September 8, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to upgrading the SLL ALM Controller to version 1.7 on Base.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Increase USDC CCTP Rate Limits - September 8, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to increasing the USDC Cross-chain Transfer Protocol rate limits.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Onboard PYUSD-USDS Curve Pool - September 8, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding the PYUSD/USDS Curve Pool to the Spark Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Onboard USDS SPK Farm - September 8, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding the USDS SPK farm to the Spark Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Upgrade ALM Controller to v1.7 - September 8, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to upgrading the SLL ALM Controller to version 1.7 on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark USDS Morpho Vault Mainnet - Onboard December PT-USDS-SPK - September 8, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding the December PT-USDS-SPK token to the Spark USDS Morpho Vault on Mainnet.

metadata.title: SparkLend Mainnet - Increase USDT Cap Automator Rate Limits - September 8, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to increasing the USDT Cap Automator rate limits for SparkLend on Mainnet.

metadata.title: SparkLend Mainnet - Withdraw USDS and DAI Reserves from SparkLend - September 8, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to withdrawing USDS and DAI reserves from SparkLend to the Spark Proxy on mainnet.

metadata.title: Allocator Instance Operator Adjustment - September 15, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to modifying Launch Agent 2 allocator instance.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - September 15, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas Edit 1) updates terminology in the Atlas to reflect Executor Agents, 2) clarifies the Monthly Settlement Cycle execution process, 3) provides additional guidance regarding the usage of stUSDS BEAM, 4) builds out Spark Governance processes, 5) provides senior risk capital to Grove, 6) documents the process for sending tokens to Sky, 7) renames TechOps to TechOps Services.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Onboard Superstate USCC - September 15, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding Superstate USCC to the Spark Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - September 22, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas edit 1) updated near-term logic regarding perpetual exposures, 2) adds the Ecosystem Dispute Resolution process, 3) corrects a typographical error.

metadata.title: Grove Liquidity Layer Mainnet and Plume - Deploy Grove Liquidity Layer to Plume - September 22, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to deploying the Grove Liquidity Layer to Plume.

metadata.title: Grove Liquidity Layer Mainnet and Plume - Onboard Apollo ACRDX - September 22, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding Apollo ACRDX to the Grove Liquidity Layer on Plume.

metadata.title: Initialize Keel Mainnet ALM Controller - September 22, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to initializing the Keel ALM controller instance and whitelisting the controller on the LitePSM on the Ethereum mainnet with the listed rate limit parameters.

metadata.title: Spark Savings Mainnet - Launch Savings v2 Vaults for USDC, USDT, and ETH - September 22, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to launching Spark Savings v2 vaults for USDC, USDT, and ETH.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Add transferAsset Rate Limit for SYRUP - September 22, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to adding a transferAsset rate limit for SYRUP in the Spark Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Claim Aave Core aUSDS Rewards - September 22, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to claiming Aave Core aUSDS rewards for the Spark Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Onboard B2C2 Penny for OTC Services - September 22, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding B2C2 Penny to provide OTC services for the Spark Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark Liquidity Layer Mainnet - Onboard SparkLend ETH - September 22, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to onboarding SparkLend ETH to the Spark Liquidity Layer on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark Mainnet - SPK Staking - Configure Symbiotic Instance - September 22, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to configuring the Symbiotic Instance for SPK staking on mainnet.

metadata.title: Spark USDS Morpho Vault - Increase PT-USDe-27Nov2025 Supply Cap - September 22, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to increasing the PT-USDe-27Nov2025 supply cap.

metadata.title: SparkLend Mainnet - Withdraw USDS and DAI Reserves from SparkLend - September 22, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to withdrawing USDS and DAI reserves from SparkLend to the Spark Proxy on mainnet.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - September 29, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas edit 1) develops Risk Framework for Real World Assets, 2) authorizes Genesis Agent Backstop, 3) adds timeline for Primes to submit Atlas Edit requests, 4) authorizes Core GovOps review of Agent Artifacts, 5) authorizes transfer to Spark Foundation, 6) defines role of Spark Assets Foundation, 7) authorizes sweep of Spark profits from the Spark Liquidity Layer, 8) updates terminology in the Atlas to reflect Executor Agents, 9) improves language in the GSM Pause Delay exceptions.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - October 6, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas Edit 1) introduces Keel, 2) specifies near term logic for the October Monthly Settlement Cycle, 3) specifies expected timing for Stage 2 of Monthly Settlement Cycle implementation, 4) clarifies the definition of Genesis Capital, 5) defines the Capped SKY Oracle Wrapper, 6) allows direct investment in Pendle PTs, 7) implements Equivalent Loss Framework for real world assets, 8) increases Required Risk Capital for Superstate, 9) adds near term logic for Plume, 10) defines the Executive Process.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - October 13, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas Edit 1) introduces Launch Agent 4, 2) updates the Financial RRC Percentage for Pendle PTs, 3) updates the Grove Artifact to authorize investment in Pendle PTs, 4) corrects a definition in the Risk Framework, 5) updates terminology in the Atlas to reflect Executor Agents, 6) clarifies Governance Poll approval requirements, 7) introduces a minor language cleanup.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - October 20, 2025
metadata.summary: This proposal 1) introduces Sky Direct Exposures 2) defines the process for Interim Deployments 3) renames RRC to CRR 4) replaces Stability Scope Advisor with Core Council Risk Advisor 5) refined documentation of the spell validation process 6) provides flexibility in updating Smart Burn Engine parameters 7) adds new instances to the Grove Artifact.

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - October 27, 2025
metadata.summary: This proposal 1) enables SKY Rewards for SKY stakers 2) activates Treasury Management Function 3) updates Atlas for new Kicker Module 4) adds listing of capital contributions to Genesis Agents 5) moves to Stage 2 of Monthly Settlement Cycle 6) soft launches ASC System 7) implements StarGuard 8) adds information regarding multisigs in the Grove Artifact 9) removes Grove Interim Deployments Restrictions 10) cleans up Supporting Documents 11) updates terminology in Atlas to reflect Executor Agents.

metadata.title: stUSDS BEAM Parameter Update - October 27, 2025
metadata.summary: Signal your support or opposition to adjusting the `stepStrBps` and `stepDutyBps` parameters for the stUSDS Bounded External Access Module (stUSDS BEAM).

metadata.title: Atlas Edit Weekly Cycle Proposal - November 3, 2025
metadata.summary: This Atlas edit 1) prepares for deployment of the LayerZero bridge 2) updates the Accessibility Reward Primitive 3) renames Risk Tolerance Ratio to Encumberance Ratio 4) Adds Allocation System Primitive Documents for Launch Agent 4 5) adds new Active Instances for Grove 6) Changes Ecosystem Entity Grants to past tense 7) clarifies the process for Pioneer Chain Reimbursement 8) updates references in the Risk Framework 9) updates language regarding the MKR to SKY upgrade.
